title: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: The SaveAs function in the application is not correctly saving the file type and the icon for the saved file is incorrect.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file (e.g. move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog box will appear asking for a valid container location
5) Enter a filename without specifying the file extension
6) Click Ok

Observed Behavior: The file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but no file extension is shown for the saved file.
